title: 30 min. Traditional Full Body Strength Training Workout | Build Muscle with Dumbbells
description:
Get your December calendar here! https://buymeacoffee.com/kaleighcohen/extras

This full-body workout is all about building muscle!! This workout is a more traditional-style strength training workout with a bit of a twist! The twist comes from the structure that we will follow. The structure includes 8 exercises alternating between upper and lower allowing more rest between sets, so we can keep using HEAVY WEIGHTS!!

This workout is great for building full-body muscle in minimal time! Optional equipment is your exercise bench and wrist weights. I'll also have modifications if you don't have a bench! The focus today will be on good form, a slow tempo, and lifting heavy!

30-MINUTE TRADITIONAL FULL-BODY STRENGTH WORKOUT STRUCTURE AND EXERCISES
EQUIPMENT NEEDED
- DUMBBELLS: LIFT HEAVY!!! TODAY'S WORKOUT WILL BE MOST EFFECTIVE WITH HEAVY DUMMBEELS. THE WEIGHT YOU USE IS RELATIVE TO YOU! AS A REFERENCE I AM USNG 15LB-35LB / 6.8KG-15.8KG.

OPTIONAL EQUIPMENT
- EXERCISE BENCH
- WRIST WEIGHTS

STRUCTURE:
8 EXERCISES REPEATED THREE TIMES
WORK: 45 
SECONDS REST: 15 SECONDS

EXERCISE LIST:
-ROMANIAN DEADLIFT
-REVERSE GRIP ROW
-SQUAT
-SHOULDER PRESS
-ALTERNATING REVERSE LUNGE
-PULLOVER
-HIP THRUST
-CHEST PRESS

I am so glad you joined me for this workout! It's always better to work out with a friend!

Kaleigh

Don't forget to stretch! 👉 https://youtu.be/IjH_8pdybfs

channelDescription:
Hello! I'm Kaleigh and I create CYCLE & STRENGTH training programs to challenge and transform you into an unstoppable force!

I'm here to help you BUILD CONFIDENCE THROUGH STRENGTH!

I am a certified Spin instructor, Stages Beats instructor, NASM certified personal trainer, and Girls Gone Strong Pre/ Postnatal coaching certified with over 13 years of experience coaching all over the world!

comments: I just wanted to tell you how much I appreciate you. I’ve been following your workouts for about a year now and you’re my favorite trainer. I especially appreciate your focus on strength instead of weight loss. It would have been easy to slip into traditional weight loss talk after coming back from having a baby, but you continue to hold true to the mission of building strength. You are deeply appreciated for your authenticity, tenacity, and talents. Thank you 🙏
I've never been this consistent but since I found your videos I actually enjoy working out  again! You are truly a blessing.🙌🏻❤️

Day 29 - N C & S - Done. It’s nice that the November calendar ends with a LIVE session! Grateful for the upcoming December calendar! Thank you Kaleigh for strong and amazing workout sessions!🏁WINNING🏁⚡️🔥⚡️🔥⚡️🔥⚡️
Love the traditional workouts! Feeling strong and good! Thanks for helping us through it Kaleigh!
I was LITERALLY screaming on that last rep! But boy, I feel so strong!!💪❤ Thanks so much!
